General.Name: Yong Shun Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Yong Shun Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells resins in Taiwan. The company offers special coating resins, and fiber auxiliaries, as well as engages in manufacturing, processing, and trading of various reinforced plastic steel products. Yong Shun Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
